# Scale SVG Path

It scales SVG Path by directly changing the numbers.

For example:

```
M19 3H5c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v14c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h14c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V5c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2zM7.75 5.5H9c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v4.25c0 .41-.34.75-.75.75s-.75-.34-.75-.75V7h-.75C7.34 7 7 6.66 7 6.25s.34-.75.75-.75zm4.75 12.25c0 .41-.34.75-.75.75s-.75-.34-.75-.75V14h-1v2.25c0 .41-.34.75-.75.75s-.75-.34-.75-.75V14h-1v3.75c0 .41-.34.75-.75.75S6 18.16 6 17.75V13.5c0-.55.45-1 1-1h4.5c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v4.25zm-.5-7c0-.41.34-.75.75-.75H15V9h-2c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1V6.5c0-.55.45-1 1-1h2.75c.41 0 .75.34.75.75s-.34.75-.75.75H13.5v1h2c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v1.5c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-2.75c-.41 0-.75-.34-.75-.75zM18 16c0 .55-.45 1-1 1h-2v.75c0 .41-.34.75-.75.75s-.75-.34-.75-.75V13.5c0-.55.45-1 1-1H17c.55 0 1 .45 1 1V16z M15 14h1.5v1.5H15z
```

scale by 10, the result is:

```
M190.00 30.00H50.00c-11.00 0.00 -20.00 9.00 -20.00 20.00v140.00c0.00 11.00 9.00 20.00 20.00 20.00h140.00c11.00 0.00 20.00 -9.00 20.00 -20.00V50.00c0.00 -11.00 -9.00 -20.00 -20.00 -20.00zM77.50 55.00H90.00c5.50 0.00 10.00 4.50 10.00 10.00v42.50c0.00 4.10 -3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50s-7.50 -3.40 -7.50 -7.50V70.00h-7.50C73.40 70.00 70.00 66.60 70.00 62.50s3.40 -7.50 7.50 -7.50zm47.50 122.50c0.00 4.10 -3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50s-7.50 -3.40 -7.50 -7.50V140.00h-10.00v22.50c0.00 4.10 -3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50s-7.50 -3.40 -7.50 -7.50V140.00h-10.00v37.50c0.00 4.10 -3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50S60.00 181.60 60.00 177.50V135.00c0.00 -5.50 4.50 -10.00 10.00 -10.00h45.00c5.50 0.00 10.00 4.50 10.00 10.00v42.50zm-5.00 -70.00c0.00 -4.10 3.40 -7.50 7.50 -7.50H150.00V90.00h-20.00c-5.50 0.00 -10.00 -4.50 -10.00 -10.00V65.00c0.00 -5.50 4.50 -10.00 10.00 -10.00h27.50c4.10 0.00 7.50 3.40 7.50 7.50s-3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50H135.00v10.00h20.00c5.50 0.00 10.00 4.50 10.00 10.00v15.00c0.00 5.50 -4.50 10.00 -10.00 10.00h-27.50c-4.10 0.00 -7.50 -3.40 -7.50 -7.50zM180.00 160.00c0.00 5.50 -4.50 10.00 -10.00 10.00h-20.00v7.50c0.00 4.10 -3.40 7.50 -7.50 7.50s-7.50 -3.40 -7.50 -7.50V135.00c0.00 -5.50 4.50 -10.00 10.00 -10.00H170.00c5.50 0.00 10.00 4.50 10.00 10.00V160.00zM150.00 140.00h15.00v15.00H150.00z
```


## Usage

```
yarn add scale-svg-path
```

```ts
import {scale} from 'scale-svg-path';

const newPath = scale(currentPath, 10);
```
